Name: Sunrise Remal Resort - 2 Separate Rooms
Pros: 9.4 rating - Wonderful; 2 SEPARATE ROOMS - perfect for snoring; All-inclusive - all food & drinks included
Cons: Not adults-only; Mid-range price (€1,325); Entertainment area - request quiet room
Verdict: EXCELLENT VALUE - High rating (9.4), all amenities, competitive price. Strong alternative to Pickalbatros.

Name: Pickalbatros Royal Grand Sharm - 2 Separate Rooms
Pros: TOP RATED 9.4 - Wonderful; 7,638 reviews - extremely reliable; Adults only 16+ - no screaming kids
Cons: Most expensive option (€2,046); Has nightly entertainment - request room away; Large resort - can feel crowded
Verdict: TOP CHOICE - Best quality, adults-only, all amenities. Premium price but complete solution.

Name: Xperience Sea Breeze Resort - 2 Separate Rooms
Pros: EXCELLENT VALUE - 2nd cheapest all-inclusive option; 9.0 rating - Wonderful; 2 SEPARATE ROOMS - perfect for snoring
Cons: Not adults-only; Need to verify beach distance; Need to verify amenities details
Verdict: GREAT VALUE - Similar to Verginia at €1,073. High rating with many reviews. Worth investigating further.

Name: Verginia Sharm Resort & Aqua Park - 2 Separate Rooms
Pros: BEST VALUE - excellent rating at best price; 9.1 rating - Wonderful; 2 SEPARATE ROOMS - perfect for snoring
Cons: Has live music bar - request room away; Beach is 5 min shuttle (not beachfront); Some reviews mention dated facilities
Verdict: BEST VALUE - Great rating, all amenities, half the price of Pickalbatros. Top recommendation!

Name: Pickalbatros Golf Beach Resort - All Inclusive (Private Suite)
Pros: 9.0 rating - Wonderful; All-inclusive - all food & drinks included; 2,045 reviews - very reliable
Cons: Suite layout unknown - may not have separate bedroom; Mid-range price (€1,234); Not adults-only
Verdict: MAYBE - Great resort but need to verify suite has separate sleeping area. Good mid-range option if confirmed.

Name: Sanafir Hotel - El Pacha Suites Sharm - Adults Only
Pros: Adults only - no kids noise; Suite with separate living room (Henri sleeps there); 1,376 reviews - well proven
Cons: Not all-inclusive - meals extra; Only 8.1 rating (lower than top resorts); Real cost ~€1,100 with food
Verdict: MAYBE - Good for adults-only quiet, but living room sleeping not ideal. Consider 2-room hotel instead.

Name: Private Luxury Villas at Sharm Dreams Vacation Club
Pros: 2 bedrooms - perfect for snoring; Very spacious 200 m²; 3 bathrooms - luxury
Cons: No meals included; Rating only 7.9 (lower than hotels); Expensive for what you get
Verdict: MAYBE - Good for privacy but expensive. Better to get all-inclusive resort for similar price.

Name: Villa D60
Pros: EXCEPTIONAL 9.7 rating!; Very cheap base price; High comfort score (9.6)
Cons: Only 61 reviews - limited data; No meals - must eat out; No pool/beach/resort amenities
Verdict: INVESTIGATE - Amazing rating but need to verify layout and location before booking.

Name: 2 Bedroom apartment on luxury delta Sharm resort
Pros: 2 separate bedrooms - perfect for snoring; Full kitchen for self-catering; 135 m² - very spacious
Cons: Only 5 reviews - unproven; No meals included - must cook or eat out; No resort amenities (pool, gym, spa)
Verdict: SKIP - Too risky with only 5 reviews. Real cost similar to all-inclusive resorts.

Name: Luxury Sharm Hills Resort
Cons: No pricing data available; No rating data available; No review data available
Verdict: SKIP - Insufficient data. Need to investigate before considering.
